item.title: By: Mazel CrypTOV

item.description: Halving will be next week. This article is very useful for those who don't really know what halving is. Thanks for sharing this very informative article about Bitcoin halving.
item.content:encoded: Halving will be next week. This article is very useful for those who don’t really know what halving is. Thanks for sharing this very informative article about Bitcoin halving.
